entries.title: Laughter therapy
entries.entry: I had a really bad day today. I was so frustrated with my teacher and classmates. I felt like no one was listening to me and I was just being ignored. So I decided to take a break and watch some funny videos on YouTube. It was really funny and it made me laugh so much that I forgot about my problems for a while. It was a great way to de-stress and I'm glad I did it.

entries.title: Connecting with nature
entries.entry: Today I went for a walk in the park. It was really nice to be surrounded by nature and to just take a break from all the stress of school. I felt so relaxed and it was a great way to clear my head. I'm really grateful for the opportunity to be able to take a break and just enjoy the beauty of nature.

entries.title: Mindful moments
entries.entry: Today I tried something new. I took some time to be mindful and just focus on my breathing. It was really calming and it helped me to clear my mind. I'm really glad I took the time to do this and I'm looking forward to doing it more often.

entries.title: Freewriting
entries.entry: Today was a really tough day. I had a lot of tests and assignments due and I was feeling really overwhelmed. I was also feeling really frustrated with my teacher and classmates because I felt like no one was listening to me. I just wanted to be heard and respected but it felt like no one cared. It was really hard to stay focused and I'm glad I managed to get through it.

entries.title: Freewriting
entries.entry: Today was a good day. I managed to finish all my assignments and tests on time and I felt really proud of myself. I also had a really good conversation with my teacher and it felt like she was actually listening to me. It was really nice to feel respected and heard and I'm glad I was able to have that conversation.

entries.title: Proud moments
entries.entry: Today I got a really good grade on a test. I was so proud of myself because I worked really hard and it paid off. It was a great feeling to know that all my hard work was worth it and I'm really glad I put in the effort. It was a great reminder that hard work pays off and I'm looking forward to more successes in the future.

entries.title: Freewriting
entries.entry: Today was a really tough day. I was feeling really frustrated with my teacher and classmates because I felt like no one was listening to me. I was also feeling really overwhelmed with all the work I had to do and it was really hard to stay focused. I'm glad I managed to get through it but it was really tough.

entries.title: Cherished values
entries.entry: Today I was reminded of how important it is to stay true to my values. I was feeling really frustrated with my teacher and classmates and I was tempted to lash out and say something I would regret. But I remembered that it's important to stay true to my values and to be respectful even when I'm feeling frustrated. I'm really glad I was able to stay true to myself and I'm looking forward to more moments like this in the future.

entries.title: Freewriting
entries.entry: Today was a really tough day. I was feeling really overwhelmed with all the work I had to do and I was struggling to stay focused. I was also feeling really frustrated with my teacher and classmates because I felt like no one was listening to me. I just wanted to be heard and respected but it felt like no one cared. It was really hard to stay focused and I'm glad I managed to get through it.
